website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for an attractive salt lamp. The color and craftsmanship give off a unique, natural vibe that resonates with its soft glow.
pros: Its original design makes it a good choice for those looking for something a little different in a salt lamp, and the earthy appearance adds subtle character
cons: Some users felt the size and shape of the lamp was smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: They are add a nice pleasant glow to the room and I believe my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 4 of these lamps and have dispersed them around my house. I've put one in my mothers bedroom who has Alzheimer's. I also have a lamp in my own bedroom. They are add a nice pleasant glow to the room and I believe my mother and I sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for a bedroom space
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a bedroom space, I am convinced it's the reason I am sleeping better! It's also very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: AnonMel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. It's my first and altho' I did see some cheaper, I chose this one. I have not been disappointed. My only complaint is that the dimmer is a little fussy and touchy, sometimes turning the lamp completely off when trying to adjust. But the lamp is beautiful, warm and I LOVE the color. It is pink during day and orange at night. In fact, I have to close my bedroom door to keep it from lighting up the room. A beautiful glow but one I prefer not to see while I'm sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: gofigyer

customer_reviews.title: After doing some research I found these to be recommended. Quality of the salt seems good
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research I found these to be recommended. Quality of the salt seems good, much heavier and thicker than one I bought at a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Fulp

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with my purchase of this large lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase of this large lamp!! It fits perfectly in our family room and it gives out such a soothing and calming color. Like other customers I was surprised at how large it is and the base is beautiful. I also love the small one I have on my bedside table and I too, sleep better knowing it is there. The colors of both of our lamps are truly beautiful and the wood base completes a perfect product. Great price too, so better grab one or two!!
customer_reviews.author: Nita/Grammy :)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my lamp today, easy to put together and very good quality. It looks beautiful and gives off an ambient glow!! I have wanted one for a while now but had to research and find one that was authentic. I am very happy with my purchase!! and will but most likely purchase 2 more
customer_reviews.author: danni

customer_reviews.title: Simple and calm
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I mainly got it because of the supposed stress-reducing, anxiety-reducing, and other properties of salt lamps, BUT this thing is appealing to look at and be around regardless. It comes packaged well, finding and setting the bulb up is easy, and you're good to go in no time at all. It has a turning piece to bright/dim the light, and I just always keep it on. I won't claim that it has any special superpowers, but as said, it's just relaxing and nice to have around. It would even make a unique nightlight for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp! Warm glow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp! Warm glow! Love dimmer. Feels better in my space already! I cant be more pleased. Packaging and delivery exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Clay D

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful surprise
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the Windsor Seasons Himalayan Salt Lamp because it was such a reasonable price. When I received it, I was struck by how naturally beautiful this lamp is. I have already ordered 2 more, and am planning on ordering more and spreading them throughout different rooms in the house.The beauty of this lamp far exceeds the reasonable cost. In the 2 days that I have had the Salt Lamp, I have focused on it more than any other lamp I have ever had. I am still surprised that a Himalayan Salt Lamp can help me focus my attention so well.
customer_reviews.author: bmcg

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Buying one for every room in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Buying one for every room in my house. I have even seen a decrease in the amount of dust in my livingroom after putting up this lamp
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought it long time ago: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to enhance the air quality, after speaking with wellness-minded friends. Well, it definitely enhances the air quality, adds soft light and is just overall a great item. I originally bought one and had to buy a second one for the household. So, we have two now. What I liked about this particular product is the wooden base (although I use a ceramic plate underneath, just in case), the fact that it is made of natural materials. The lamps differ in shape and in size a little, as they're carved out of natural salt deposits. So, all in all, a great product worth the investment. I would recommend it to anyone. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and beautiful lighting for your room
customer_reviews.text: Salt lamp is boxed securely, all you have to do is open it up, assemble it (put the lightbulb into the socket and insert the bulb and socket into the base of the lamp), plug it in and turn it on to enjoy perfect mood lighting! The switch is an incremental switch that allows you to set the brightness of the bulb. In a dark room it can act as a night light or even brighten up the room enough to see everything. I don’t think it is bright enough light to read by. However it works great for romantic evenings, baby’s rooms, or just general enhancement to your room’s decor.
customer_reviews.author: E. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice looking salt lamp. It is better constructed than most I have seen. Looks warming and elegant!
customer_reviews.author: J D's Place

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for me and both my sons and they look great. One of them suffers from anxiety, so that's what triggered the purchase as they say this salt emits ions that can help. Either way, they emit a very cool glow and the brightness control lets you set the atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp....but SO MUCH MORE...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase few days ago....read about salt lamp being beneficial to people w/dementia which my momma is in early stages....although a bit skeptical about what it can do, I loved the look so I bought! After a few days w/lamp at my mother's bedside....SHUT THE FRONT DOOR!!!!!! She has slept peacefully, soundly and has felt good the next day......lamp is on all the time and if this is what it can do to my beloved momma....24/7/365 that lamp will be on! Windsor Seasons customer service is awesome, let me know lamp was in route...and followed up....with all this.....purchasing another for my room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I display one in the living room and one in the master bedroom. The positive ions seem to freshen the air and give you energy; sort of like after a spring rain! It's calming before falling to sleep and the light doesn't keep one awake; quite the opposite. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Helps You Sleep Better
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this lamp. I sleep so much better at night. You don't notice anything but it really makes a change in the air. I have this on my night table. I've told many of my friends and family about this and they're going to get one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Stay sleep, breathe easy
customer_reviews.text: Creates a calming atmosphere. My boyfriend has a constant fan going and he would wake up throughout the night or I would wake up groggy from the dust partoclrs blowing all over the place. The salt lamp over time made it a lot easier to fall and stay sleep throughout the night. It also noticeably helps "stale" air
customer_reviews.author: shavon

customer_reviews.title: great purchase and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic, the quality is more than I had expected! My son has severe allergies and loves this said he is sleeping much better. Customer service is fantastic I had a question regarding the lamp and they got back to me right away and were a pleasure to work with. Will definitely be buying form them again.
customer_reviews.author: decoteau

customer_reviews.title: It’s tiny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for over 30 bucks thinking it would be larger than the average salt rock lamp out there for $15. Nope. It’s small, find one for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp. It gives off a warm-colored glow. I leave it on 24/7. At night I dial it way down, it gives off just enough glow to navigate the room in the middle of the night. Don’t know if it’s doing all the things it claims, but for the money, it’s still a nice lamp for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good salt lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice lamp, very heavy, warm glow is nice. Haven't had it that long, but it is working so far. Will update should that change.
customer_reviews.author: GeeWiz

customer_reviews.title: Dimmer switch works fine. The rock itself gets pretty warm
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! Solid construction. Didn't have any issues with lamp or bulb being broken, it was very well packaged. Dimmer switch works fine. The rock itself gets pretty warm, but it doesn't transfer heat-the base, cord and anything close to the lamp (wooden picture frames, the wall) aren't hot.Too soon to tell if any of the "benefits" are real, but very happy with the lamp and I ordered 2 smaller ones for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: horsedogmom

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly larger than I had expected. Very solid craftsmanship ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly larger than I had expected. Very solid craftsmanship, and a lovely light setting. Gift for my girlfriend and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Zach Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I plugged my lamp in I loved it! Within a few hours I could tell a difference in my home. It’s been a little over a week now and my breaking is better and my home smells so clean every time I walk in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B.

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love my new salt lamp! It's beautiful and it even has a dimmer switch. I feel so much better when I sit neat it. Thanks for a great product and excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: it has a beautiful glow. You are able to adjust the brightness ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp seems to be of high quality, it has a beautiful glow. You are able to adjust the brightness which is very nice. I was impressed by the packing of the lamp, everything was wrapped thoroughly. It is much heavier than I expected so I am pleased that time was taken to ensure it was protected during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Suen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product and even more importantly, excellent customer service! Mine arrived with a broken part and they replaced the entire piece right away. And it arrived expeditiously. Now that’s my kind of service. I will purchase another one. Buy it, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ang L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Soothing.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful !!! Was delivered right on time, perfectly packaged, and a stunning display. 🤗 I was a little “down in the dumps” after sustaining an injury that prevented me from partaking in the Christmas Season as I had planned, and although I celebrated the real Reason for the Season ✝️.. I was pretty much home-bound. This little lamp came today and shined it’s light for all to see. I love it!!!! Bought this one for the bedroom... but I’m going to use a gift card I received to get another for my living room. Wonderful Product.
customer_reviews.author: Scuttlebutt

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL LAMP! This is the third lamp I've bought ...
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL LAMP! This is the third lamp I've bought (all different vendors). This one has been my favorite vendor. My next one I will be purchasing from them. The lamp is beautiful, and I fell in love with it from the moment I took it out of the box. The color is gorgeous and I have not had any problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp. Well worth the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp. Well worth the price I paid. I really like the dimmer function. Could be packed a little better. They are quite heavy and a single layer of wrap is not enough. The base was not exactly flat, so it wobbled a little. I quickly fixed it with sand paper. I can not comment on the therapeutic properties, as I purchased it more for aesthetics. I would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great salt lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this lamp because it was fairly priced and had good reviews. Soon after I placed my order I received an email from the company with very helpful information about care of the lamp. When my lamp was received I was concerned about the color I contacted the company and they sent a new one which is perfect. We really like the warm glow this salt lamp provides and have it lite 24/7. We haven't had it long enough to know if it does help with allergies or aid purification but feel it's a very positive addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Happy

customer_reviews.title: The color & price amazing! Would totally suggest to any one wanting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally what I had hoped for!!! The lamp puts out the warmest peach light. The color & price amazing! Would totally suggest to any one wanting to warm a room or house up with color. And the negative ions are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Ted Clendenen

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who use to wake up congested every morning. With the use of this lamp he is congestion free. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beauty.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first salt lamp. Spent a lot of time on reviews and am so pleased I chose this one. Colour is gorgeous. Dimmer switch works perfectly and beautiful Neem wood base makes it the best choice. I shall certainly buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL AND AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp I have two others and bought this one for a Xmas gift it truly is an authentic Himalayan salt lamp... I will be purchasing another one for myself as well as a few others for gifts. Dimmer works perfect.... light has a beautiful warm orange glow. Extremely happy arrived on time wrapped extremely well to protect the salt lamp and guard against breakage. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: wii mom

customer_reviews.title: Improved sleep
customer_reviews.text: This has made a wonderful addition to my bedroom. I turn it on about 1.2 an hour before I plan to go to bed. I leave it on and the soft light accompanies me through the night and I am sleeping much better. I turn it down to just provide enough light to get to the bathroom and the ambiance of my room is greatly improved,
customer_reviews.author: JP the 3rd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: So much I want to say about this lamp. First of all, it’s heavy! Lol. The size is perfect. The lamp was packaged very well. Even though they put the bulb inside the lamp for protection, the little box the bulb was in was a little damaged(see picture), but luckily, the bulb itself was not. I also love that you can adjust the lighting by simply using the switch. So far, the lamp works just fine(I just received this today). Hopefully it’ll continue to work in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Taffy

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: There was a problem with the first lamp but,James from Windsor seasons made it right for me and the replacement lamp OMG is perfect. I love my lamp.I would absolutely buy another lamp from Windsor seasons ,you can not go wrong.I would absolutely say go ahead buy one the lamps are beautiful and they work.I was given one as a gift for Christmas that is why I wanted another one.the customer service you get from Windsor seasons is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: theres

customer_reviews.title: Great Gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these lamps as gifts and they've been spot on each time. This is apparently a family business that takes their product and their customer service seriously. From the pictures friends have sent, the lamps are prominently displayed and well appreciated. Many thanks to the Spencers for their product.
customer_reviews.author: Kumuhoe

customer_reviews.title: I made the perfect choice with this lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was exactly what I was hoping it would be! It was a gift for my daughter & I wanted it to be perfect! I was very happy with everything. It arrived when I was told it would. It was wrapped extremely well, and I appreciated that. The lamp is beautiful! The presentation is beautiful as well! The size is perfect! I have waited almost a year to buy this lamp, looking around for one, and I’m so glad I chose this one because it is what I had imagined I wanted! Thank you very much! I love this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! This lamp looks good even when not lit! The base is sturdy with notches for the cord so it can be turned as desired. The color is is a lovely pink without the light and a deep orange when the light is on. I really appreciate the dimmer on the light, not something you find on most lamps other companies sell. I can set it to any level of light I choose from barely on to very bright. The heft of this lamp is impressive and I couldn't be more pleased! You won't regret purchasing this gorgeous lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Tina McCauley

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: My initial review was a 1 star due to the lamp being broken upon arrival. Less than 24 hrs after emailing customer service I received an email back that a replacement lamp would be shipped. Customer service (directly with Windsor Seasons) is extremely helpful, friendly and courteous. The lamp is BEAUTIFUL. Very heavy and beautifully hand cut. THANK YOU WINDSOR SEASONS! Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Srb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp, the soft orange glow is a nice upgrade for my desk at work. Had a little issue but after contacting Windsor a replacement was sent within a day. Great lamp great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: AV shopper

customer_reviews.title: Prompt service - good quality lamp
customer_reviews.text: Prompt service - good quality lamp. I purchased one for myself and one for a gift. Both lamps were unique and beautiful! I will be purchasing more for around my house for the soft light. I like the dimmer switch to soften the glow at night. If you are not sure about getting this salt lamp i suggest going for it - you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Allen

customer_reviews.title: I could not possibly be happier with my beautiful Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I could not possibly be happier with my beautiful Salt Lamp. I put in in the bedroom and have been sleeping much better. The warm slow is so relaxing. I am going to order another for the living room. I highly recommend this. It came on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: AGNES REYES

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It has a beautiful glow and I received it in perfect condition. I have e-mailed the Seller to ask a few questions about the lamp and I got a response right away. Very professional and pleasant! I recommend this lamp and I hope to get the benefits the salt lamp claims to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! We had some issues upon arrival with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! We had some issues upon arrival with the bulb and the plastic ring holding it, but these issues were resolved quickly through the company. It’s a beautiful ‘night light’ for my son and I love the dimming feature.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Soft Amber Glow is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a perfect gift. The in line dimmer is great for setting the right light level. We have it in the bedroom and tge soft amber glow is the perfect night light as it does not disrupt our sleep. It is beautiful. Not sure about supposed health benefits, but we love it just the same.
customer_reviews.author: R. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I love how you can dim it
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has a very soothing affect on me. I love it, I love how you can dim it, or make it brighter, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: mrfulgi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Himalayan Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really love this salt lamp. It is bigger than what I expected. Good quality. Nice base. Easy to assemble in less than 2 minutes. I read on a review before purchasing that it helps you sleep. I have also experienced better sleep since having this lamp on at night when I sleep. I highly recommend this lamp!!! You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: mmuk1211

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY LAMP.
customer_reviews.text: I love my lamp, and I use it every single night. It's such a great quality, the shape is unique on every single one, the light is bright enough to read in the dark, it can dim extremely low as well, and the transition between settings is so smooth. This never gets hot, and you don't have to worry about it overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: A great, healing glow!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition to my space! Health benefits aside, having a salt lamp in my room has been a comfort (I love the warm glow it produces). Unfortunately, I leave it on quite often and the bulb is already burnt out, so I’m really missing it! The adjustable dimmer is a great feature, too, and I often turn it on low at night and sleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is by far the prettiest salt lamp that I have owned. I have purchased several over the years that were cheaper but I think this one was worth the extra money. i love the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlene

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Gift and I waited for the opinion of my Aunt and she is so pleased, gratefull and happy. This lamp gave her all the benefits mentioned and a peacefull sleep ,every night. Beautiful lamp, ideal, for any decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: I just found out about salt lamps last year. Since then I gave my husband one for his birthday and now am ordering them as Christmas gifts. Thank you and God Bless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color was amazing even without the light on!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this lamp! The lamp that we got was a beautiful color, deeper in tones and not so pink which is perfect for this was for my husband for his office. We are very happy with this lamp for the dimmer switch works 100 times better than our first lamp I purchased from a different company. I absolutely would encourage anyone to buy from you! I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lipps

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 as night table lamps and they are gorgeous. They dim in a wide range and give off lots of light, but can be changed to a very low, romantic amber lighting as well. They are bigger than I thought they would be (a plus) and their coloring is a very beautiful amber. I have already recommended these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Julia McGlothlin

customer_reviews.title: The real deal; not fake; love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love my lamp. Will probably get another as I have quite a large living room / dining room area. These lamps are definitely not fake. Leave mine on 24/7 and it keeps the area much better.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for a larger room
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find a large salt lamp that was not overpriced. This was perfect for a larger room. The dimmer switch is brilliant and much needed as I found out with another salt lamp I had received. (they can be very bright and not conducive for sleep). The only con - which really is not a con, is that I wish it came with a second lightbulb for backup.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Dark orange pinkish hues.  Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY my best salt lamp purchase. I love these, but this Windsor is my finest yet. The color hues are simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Superknown

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The original shipment didn't come with the light bulb, but after contacting Windsor Seasons, the founder acted quickly and mailed two bulbs within a couple days. I appreciate the speedy response and kind customer service. The lamp works great and I really like the dimmer switch to adjust the brightness as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Blotter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our home
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful lamp. It is exactly what I wanted. It emits a warm glow that enhances my mood everytime I see it. It also serves as a great nightlight. It is the perfect size. It came securely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Salt Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item so I can’t say whether or not it helps with the things that it claims to, but it is a very pretty lamp that seems to be good quality. I am pleased with it even if all it does is look pretty! Planning to order more as soon as they’re back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: jes

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this company and its products
customer_reviews.text: I was enjoying my lamp and its soft glow when the dimmer switch had a short and kept flickering off and on till it wouldn't work at all. When I sent an email to the company I got a response immediately and was sent a brand new cord within a matter of a couple of days with many apologies. I highly recommend this company and its products!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Laxson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!! Got it in the mail today and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! Got it in the mail today and plug it in and it doesn't work!! Light is broken!! Not happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Proper review after this is given at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I will send a review later. This is going to be a Christmas gift. I did not try it out when it arrived. I will leave that up to the recipient. I am hoping this is going to be a happy surprise. My rating will probably go to a 5-star at that time. Until then I will leave it with a 4-star.
customer_reviews.author: GHBRN

customer_reviews.title: This is such a cool lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The mailman asked me if someone had sent me a rock! It's nice and heavy and puts off the most beautiful glow. I love the dimmer aspect and keep it at mid range, although I haven't turned it off since I got it. Made me so happy, that I bought one for a friend... sharing is caring! The best part is no two are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Working condition- quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. We bought one local and had to return, plugged in and did not turn on. This one we got from Windsor Seasons was perfect, great color, fast shipping and recipient loved.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought the larger version as it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought the larger version as it seems small where I placed it. The chord could be a bit longer and you may need to buy an extension chord.
customer_reviews.author: Ps2os2

customer_reviews.title: I love my lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love my lamp. It is very soothing and comforting. I sometimes use the dimmer and sometimes sleep with it on full light, but due to the way the rock is it doesn't bother my sleep. I feel like it gives me a little energy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Beautiful Glow!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is really beautiful. The color is soothing and warm! We have it in the living room and it adds a cozy glow. It is worth the price and would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this lamp for his girlfriend. She was very excited about it. She loves the way it looks in her room. It is a quality product, not like some of the knock-off that were in the stores for the same price. It was an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: As described. It actually had a little dirt on it, which I thought was neat; just brushed it off. I keep this on 24 hrs a day in the family room. I am unable to confirm the possible benefits, but I like the color and soft light. It works well as a night light. It sits next to my little water fountain and is quite relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Denise N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and company!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Windsor Seasons salt lamp recently and I love it. It came well wrapped and unbroken. The pink/amber glow is very beautiful. With a number of fakes in the market I can say this is the real Himalayan Salt lamp. Mind included a dimmer switch which works great. I will recommend this company to my friends without reservation. I am going to buy another smaller lamp for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very beneficial.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised by the weight and size of the lamp. We use it as a night lamp in the living room. Too early to tell of the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: vanhalen4vr

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this salt lamp! I have a couple lamps in my home, but this one is the best! The dimmer is such a cold feature that the others do not have, and I love the size and overall unpolished look! Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! First, everything worked and the actual salt rock is a nice shape. The base was not nicked or chipped. The dimmer is great. I dim it at night so my room isn't too bright. I've had it for a little over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Rhon S

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered 3 of these lamps and they are just beautiful and so user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these lamps and they are just beautiful and so user friendly!!! Colors on them are beautiful with one being an ombré color! Love the fact that they have a dimmer switch on the cord! I would definitely order again! Very happy here🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legit salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: Legit salt lamp. It swets like it’s supposed to so I would buy this again. It’s hard to find legit salt lamps out there. Great lighting and I love the dimmer switch. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: i am in love with this lamp!! i have purchased lamps from two other companies and they are no where near the beauty of this lamp! this lamp is definitely real! its heavy and the colors are just gorgeous! i have salt lamps thru my whole house but now i want to buy a few more from this seller just to replace them. i can honestly say i am %100 satisfied with my lamp! and i definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: ElaineV

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with these lamps! I purchased 2 of them and couldn't be happier. I love that they are dimmable. They are nice heavy pieces with a pretty pink hue. They come with a lovely wood stand. I would recommend to anyone looking for a great quality lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Synthia Sniff

customer_reviews.title: Wood base awful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and both arrived with the finish on the wood bases pitted and marred. I requested replacements and they arrived with the same issue. Otherwise, the salt lamp is nice and works. Disappointed the in the quality of the base and will return.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. It hasn't sweat like some people have seen. I've had it for almost 2 weeks. I can't tell if the air quality is any better. I'm not sure how you can know that. But I do like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: lovebooks

customer_reviews.title: love this item.
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged nice and took it out put it together and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: It is rather on the heavy side which I was expecting. But I was not expecting it to be so awesome. Beautiful color. Perfect proportion. I have it on my night stand and never turn it off. I dim it to a low glow at night and high during the day, Does not get hot. Stays cool.
customer_reviews.author: kaye l adamson

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed and unappealing
customer_reviews.text: The lamp I received was completely scuffed on the base. The wood was pretty destroyed. The actual lamp doesn't look great. However, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relax !
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lamp. Heavy, and the perfect size. My only complaint is the dimmer switch. It's horrible to turn on and off. The glow is so pretty at any setting and is extremely relaxing. Very happy with purchase. Dimmer switch needs replaced with something better.
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and beautiful. It is much smaller than described but the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: ashley84

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and didnt melt like the one my friend got
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and didnt melt like the one my friend got. Only got 4 stars bc I the bottom of it I not well constructed. You simply set the lamp on top of the bulb, but there is no slot for the cord to fit through so it does not sit flat and instead is smashing the cord instead which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: It is just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: We have it come on before we get up and it is so nice to have it lit and have the color.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: It is above and beyond expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is incredibly beautiful and the customer service impeccable. I wish more companies were like this one! It is a Christmas present and I know the recipient will be so excited to open this gift Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with my new salt lamp. It is a great quality, feels substantial and heavy and was shipped very fast. The sellers were also very responsive with offering assistance if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is seriously my favorite salt lamp I’ve ever seen, and now I own it! The size is great, it’s on the larger side, and the glow from the light is a gorgeous soft pink. This lamp even comes with a built in dimmer so you can adjust the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: A real salt lamp  I tasted it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Its genuine. Made in Pakistan. Cor goes from soft amber to pretty pink when its turned up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Not sure in the actually improve ones health, but they are very nice in the bedroom. The soft glow is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: STUNNING! Absolutely the most beautiful Salt Lamp! So many swirls of pink hues and the summer switch is just brilliant! The customer service is beyond incredible I was blown away by the efficiency and super fast response to any questions. Highly recommend this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: alana

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love my new & first Himalayan salt lamp. Nothing was broken when it came in the mail. It’s a beautiful & big lamp which I love! But only thing I didn’t like was that it only comes with one bulb & it breaks very very easily. I sadly broke the bulb the first day that it came. So I’d advise whoever buys one to also buy some backup bulbs on Amazon too, just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative as a night light
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lamp. The dimming option is great. Great option as a night light. It’s definitely not bright, even at the highest level. I was hoping to use it to read picture books to my 1yo but it’s a bit too dark for that. I love it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Keiko

customer_reviews.title: Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night for a nightlight. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Windsor Seasons Hand Crafted Natural Large 9-Inch Crystal Himalayan Salt Lamp with Neem Wood Base, 6-Feet Cord, Dimmer Switch and Bulb
product_meta.description:
Amazon.com

 * Brighten your room with the Windsor Seasons Himalayan Natural Crystal Salt Lamp. The warm amber light from this lamp complements any space, while also activating the salt crystal to purify the air.
   
   
 * Natural Ionizer and Air Purifier. Anecdotal evidence shows each lamp emits ions that counter-balance electromagnetic radiation reducing physical fatigue, stress and sluggishness. This natural ionization pulls harmful contaminants and allergens out of the air so you can breathe easier and enjoy a more restful sleep. After a long, stressful day, the Salt Lamp's calming amber glow and natural negative ion balance aids in relaxing you and reduces your stress levels.
   
   
 * Great natural remedy for fighting insomnia, allergies, asthma, anxiety or stress-related issues.
   
   
 * Control the Glow. Our dimmer control switch helps adjust the brightness level of the Salt Lamp to suit your mood. Whether you'd prefer a luminous glow for reading and relaxing, soft illumination to lull yourself to a deep sleep, or for any level in between you can choose your perfect setting. Once lit the lamp will emit a calming amber glow.
   
   
 * Unique and Hand Crafted. Each lamp is hand-mined in the Himalayan Mountains and is unique in shape and form the height varies whilst retaining its weight. 3.5kg +/- 200g. This lamp makes for a naturally beautiful accessory. Only the purest salt rock is used for each lamp.
   
   
 * Contents include Himalayan Salt Lamp, 6 ft UL approved cord with dimmer switch, 15w bulb and wood base attached to the salt lamp.
   
   
 * 100% satisfaction or your money back! Order now and give your home a new, vibrant energy, pleasant ambiance and contemporary edge.
feature_bullets: Only we at Windsor Seasons sell Windsor Seasons lamps on Amazon to ensure quality and safety. ONLY THE PUREST HIMALAYAN CRYSTAL ROCK SALT. Our lamp is exclusively carved internally and externally for the best possible glow. Salt crystals with the best clarity, shape, color and purity are hand-selected for the highest quality around 9"height. Note: To help with the environment we email you instructions about the lamp as you receive it.

ANECDOTAL EVIDENCE SHOWS THERAPEUTIC HEALTH BENEFITS WORKS AS AN IONIZER AND AIR PURIFIER: The lamp emits negative ions that fight against electromagnetic radiation and fight fatigue and sluggishness The naturally ionized air also helps you sleep better at night, allowing you to wake with an enhanced mood and feeling refreshed.

NATURAL GLOW: Accentuate your living or workspace with warm lighting, casting a calming amber glow. Each lamp is hand-mined in the Himalayan Mountains and carved in a unique shape by our master craftsmen.

3.5KG LARGE LAMP WITH GENUINE NEEM WOOD BASE: Each lamp is hand-mined in the Himalayan Mountains and is unique in shape and form. As the lamp is carved by hand the height can vary by +/-10% whilst retaining its weight 3.5kg +/- 200g. This is a substantial lamp loved by our customers.
DIMMABLE LIGHTING:Updated Safe UL Power Cord. Our lamp is brighter, but can be turned down to suit your needs with our inclusive dimmer control switch FCC, CE, RoHS Approved, UL Certified

specifications.Material: Pure Himalayan Crystal Salt Rock, Wood
specifications.Special Features: Instant On, Dimmable, Carved internally and externally for optimum glow, Ionizer
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars561 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
